attributes.action: Clean up litter on Manchester’s streets and keep a regular litter pick routine.
attributes.additional_details:
Here some locals words on living in Manchester:

https://www.tripadvisor.co.uk/ShowTopic-g187069-i236-k6687399-Litter-Manchester_Greater_Manchester_England.html

One of many news articles: 

https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/levenshulme-alley-dirty-rats-flytipping-14517999

It’s not difficult to find information online about the litter and potential health problems relating to it. Evidence of the problem is very clear walking the streets of Manchester.
attributes.background: There has been a known problem of litter in Manchester for a number of years, with some research, the problem seems to have become worse due to insufficient funding from the government. After a recent visit, I was shocked by the amount of litter built up in many areas, more so on the outskirts.

rejection.details:
Local litter collection is the responsibility of your local authority. You can contact your councillor, who represents you, about this issue:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Manchester City Council also has its own e-petitions service here:

http://petitions.manchester.gov.uk/petitions.ti
